law.catch_line: In the case of voluntary dissolution, the articles of dissolution shall include:...

section.section: If the dissolution is authorized under § 3-402 of this subtitle, a majority of the incorporators or a majority of the entire board of directors, as the case may be, shall execute articles of dissolution for the corporation in the manner required by Title 1 of this article.
In all other cases, articles of dissolution shall be executed by the persons and in the manner required by Title 1 of this article.
